page.title: 03Chilton Trinity village
page.content: Life is fairly busy with a coalyard and plastics works on one side of the village. There are 4 farms and many fields. An electrician, builder, decorator, and an ice_cream man live in the village and do occasional jobs for the villagers as well as working away. Every day there is a batch of coal lorries and tractors coming around the local lanes. Also a school bus for Wembdon School stops here. There is plenty of social life connected with the village hall.There are karate lessons, table_tennis clubs with a team playing in the Bridgwater league, a keep_fit class, discos, chesse and wine parties and skittles nights, along with the occasional whist drive. There are childrens parties at Christmas and a meal at harvest time. Church services are held on Sunday mornings.
